name: Black Bart
description: Play for the most successful burglar of stagecoaster in the history of the Wild West. The hero of the quest, who above all appreciates human life, makes afraid without a single shot.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: with 512 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 263 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
